## TransactableARTH.closeTrove() method

Close existing Trove by repaying all debt and withdrawing all collateral.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
closeTrove(): Promise<TroveClosureDetails>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[TroveClosureDetails](./arth-base.troveclosuredetails.md)<!-- -->&gt;

## Exceptions

Throws [TransactionFailedError](./arth-base.transactionfailederror.md) in case of transaction failure.
